attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A medieval estate in Scotland is in danger of being destroyed. The old gardens have become a paradise for young and old. The ruins at the heart were once tall and strong. The plant and animal species is spectacular. And the grounds are almost a thousand years old. King Robert Bruce was the first recorded owner. 

And now the trees are being burned down, the visitors are being mugged and gangs of youths looking for the next fight stalk the dark woods at night.

Something needs done!

Bourtreehill Medieval Estate,
Bourtreehill, 
Irvine,
Ayrshire.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
